explains: n. 车前草，香蕉之一种

sentences.en: A wax obtained from the leaves of a plantain.
sentences.cn: 取自车前草的叶子的一种蜡。

sentences.en: It makes a lovely picture, the bamboo houses set off by green plantain trees.
sentences.cn: 它使一个可爱的图片，竹房屋抵销的绿色芭蕉树。

sentences.en: Plantain contains a chemical (called allantoin) that is anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial.
sentences.cn: 车前草含有一种叫做尿囊素的化学物质，是消炎抗菌的。
